title: Shurima Art contest shortlist
body:
http://i.imgur.com/IWfNrED.jpg

Hey everyone,

Entries for the art contest has closed and the shortlist has been revealed!

You can find the full album of shortlisted entries here - https://www.facebook.com/media/set/?set=a.688661317941961.1073741875.243324295809001&type=1&l=7d3991c249

You can vote by liking the image. The artists of the most liked images on July 24th 11:59 pm AEST will win the top prize. You can read more about the competition here - http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/GV39d3IN-2016-shurima-art-contest

replies.body: I know, i love that we have so many talented artists in our community! Hopefully we can do more to showcase their work.
its nice to see stuff like this, showing off what the community can do and not being known for being as salty as vegemite{{item:3070}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

They all look fantastic! congrats everyone.
I wish i could draw/paint things like that! 

well Its not exactly 'art' but seeming we are in the Shuriman mood, ill share something i made.
Its not going to win any competitions like some of those fantastic pieces but hope you all enjoy :P

http://imgur.com/S6As9iT

Congrats to everyone who's made it this far, and best of luck! 

Great submissions!
I cant believe I made the short list
when will winners be announced and short listings get there prizes ?

> [{quoted}](name=vanrompz,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=0EXHmFRE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-06-25T04:33:49.272+0000)
>
> when will winners be announced and short listings get there prizes ?

Once the votes are counted - hopefully soon!

How come we didn't see any information about this contest earlier? The only thing that was publicized was "It's closed. vote now." Maybe make a bigger deal of it when it's open/started? I know a few of my friends would love to submit to these contests, but we never know about them until it's too late.
It was posted in the boards when it started. Pay more attention.

> [{quoted}](name=Take the Lantern,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=0EXHmFRE,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-06-23T07:24:12.246+0000)
>
> How come we didn't see any information about this contest earlier? The only thing that was publicized was "It's closed. vote now." Maybe make a bigger deal of it when it's open/started? I know a few of my friends would love to submit to these contests, but we never know about them until it's too late.

Community Events are posted to the Community Portal, as well as usually as announcements on the League website and various social media platforms (Facebook and Twitter). 

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/community
https://twitter.com/LOL_Oceania
https://www.facebook.com/LeagueOfLegendsOceania

But I'm sure that Riot would love to reach as many people as possible, so if you have any suggestions as to bolster communications on this front, I'm sure they'd be receptive to it! Sorry to hear that you and your friends weren't able to participate in this event, but hopefully we'll be seeing your entries in the upcoming contests!

Cheers, 
Wuks
